CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The HOMO energy level was determined by using oxidation onsets ( E ox ) of the polymer films.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Material Name" entities:

1. HOMO (Hybrid Orbital Molecular Orbital) - This is a theoretical concept used in chemistry to describe the energy level of a molecule.
2. polymer films - This is a type of material made up of long chains of repeating molecules.
3. E ox - This is an abbreviation for "oxidation onset," which refers to the energy required to remove an electron from a molecule.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, here are the entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name":

1. polymer films - This is a type of material made up of long chains of repeating molecules.

So, the only entity that refers to "Material Name" in the paragraph is "polymer films".

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to "Material Name", presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| polymer films |

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The HOMO energy level was determined by using oxidation onsets ( E ox ) of the polymer films.

In the given paragraph, the following are the "Property Name" entities:

1. HOMO (Hetero-Multiplicity Optimization) - This is the name of the energy level being referred to.
2. E ox - This is the abbreviation for "oxidation onset," which is a property of the polymer films.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.

Sure! Here are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties:

1. HOMO (Hetero-Multiplicity Optimization) - This is a material property that refers to the energy level of the polymer films.
2. E ox - This is a material property that refers to the oxidation onset of the polymer films.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to material properties, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Property Name":

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO (Hetero-Multiplicity Optimization) |
| E ox (oxidation onset) |

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any further questions.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: The HOMO energy level was determined by using oxidation onsets ( E ox ) of the polymer films.

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Property Value" entities:

1. HOMO energy level: This is a property value that is determined by the oxidation onsets (Eox) of the polymer films.
2. Eox: This is a property value that represents the oxidation onset of the polymer films, which is used to determine the HOMO energy level.

Therefore, the two property values mentioned in the paragraph are:

1. HOMO energy level
2. Eox (oxidation onset)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure! Here are the entities that refer to the value of material properties in the given paragraph:

1. HOMO energy level: This is a property value that represents the highest occupied molecular orbital energy level of the polymer films.
2. Eox: This is a property value that represents the oxidation onset of the polymer films, which is used to determine the HOMO energy level.

So, the two entities that refer to the value of material properties in the paragraph are:

1. HOMO energy level
2. Eox (oxidation onset)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Certainly! Here are the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| HOMO energy level |
| Eox (oxidation onset) |
